sqlMap.select: SELECT FLIGHT_SN, DTRMC_FLIGHT, DTRMC_START_ARPRT_CODE, DTRMC_START_CTY, TO_CHAR(DTRMC_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DTRMC_START_DT , DTRMC_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE, DTRMC_ARVL_CTY, TO_CHAR(DTRMC_ARVL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DTRMC_ARVL_DT , HMCMG_FLIGHT, HMCMG_START_ARPRT_CODE, HMCMG_START_CTY, TO_CHAR(HMCMG_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS HMCMG_START_DT , HMCMG_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE, HMCMG_ARVL_CTY, TO_CHAR(HMCMG_ARVL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS HMCMG_ARVL_DT FROM TB_FLIGHT F WHERE F.FLIGHT_SN IN ( SELECT FLIGHT_SN FROM TB_CART_GOODS WHERE PURCHS_AT = 'N' AND ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND FLIGHT_SN IS NOT NULL )

SELECT F.FLIGHT_SN, F.DTRMC_FLIGHT, F.DTRMC_START_ARPRT_CODE, F.DTRMC_START_CTY, TO_CHAR(F.DTRMC_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DTRMC_START_DT , F.DTRMC_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE, F.DTRMC_ARVL_CTY, TO_CHAR(F.DTRMC_ARVL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DTRMC_ARVL_DT , F.HMCMG_FLIGHT, F.HMCMG_START_ARPRT_CODE, F.HMCMG_START_CTY, TO_CHAR(F.HMCMG_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS HMCMG_START_DT , F.HMCMG_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE, F.HMCMG_ARVL_CTY, TO_CHAR(F.HMCMG_ARVL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS HMCMG_ARVL_DT , A1.ARPRT_NM AS DTRMC_START_ARPRT_NM, A2.ARPRT_NM AS DTRMC_ARVL_ARPRT_NM, A3.ARPRT_NM AS HMCMG_START_ARPRT_NM, A4.ARPRT_NM AS HMCMG_ARVL_ARPRT_NM FROM TB_FLIGHT F LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ARPRT A1 ON F.DTRMC_START_ARPRT_CODE = A1.ARPRT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ARPRT A2 ON F.DTRMC_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE = A2.ARPRT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ARPRT A3 ON F.HMCMG_START_ARPRT_CODE = A3.ARPRT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ARPRT A4 ON F.HMCMG_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE = A4.ARPRT_CODE WHERE F.FLIGHT_SN IN ( SELECT FLIGHT_SN FROM TB_CART_GOODS WHERE PURCHS_AT = 'N' AND ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND FLIGHT_SN IS NOT NULL )

SELECT F.FLIGHT_SN, F.DTRMC_FLIGHT, F.DTRMC_START_ARPRT_CODE, F.DTRMC_START_CTY, TO_CHAR(F.DTRMC_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DTRMC_START_DT , F.DTRMC_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE, F.DTRMC_ARVL_CTY, TO_CHAR(F.DTRMC_ARVL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DTRMC_ARVL_DT , F.HMCMG_FLIGHT, F.HMCMG_START_ARPRT_CODE, F.HMCMG_START_CTY, TO_CHAR(F.HMCMG_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS HMCMG_START_DT , F.HMCMG_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE, F.HMCMG_ARVL_CTY, TO_CHAR(F.HMCMG_ARVL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS HMCMG_ARVL_DT , A1.ARPRT_NM AS DTRMC_START_ARPRT_NM, A2.ARPRT_NM AS DTRMC_ARVL_ARPRT_NM, A3.ARPRT_NM AS HMCMG_START_ARPRT_NM, A4.ARPRT_NM AS HMCMG_ARVL_ARPRT_NM FROM TB_FLIGHT F LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ARPRT A1 ON F.DTRMC_START_ARPRT_CODE = A1.ARPRT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ARPRT A2 ON F.DTRMC_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE = A2.ARPRT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ARPRT A3 ON F.HMCMG_START_ARPRT_CODE = A3.ARPRT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ARPRT A4 ON F.HMCMG_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE = A4.ARPRT_CODE WHERE F.FLIGHT_SN = #flight_sn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FLIGHT ( ESNTL_ID, FLIGHT_SN, DTRMC_FLIGHT, DTRMC_START_ARPRT_CODE, DTRMC_START_CTY, DTRMC_START_DT , DTRMC_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE, DTRMC_ARVL_CTY, DTRMC_ARVL_DT , HMCMG_FLIGHT, HMCMG_START_ARPRT_CODE, HMCMG_START_CTY, HMCMG_START_DT , HMCMG_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE, HMCMG_ARVL_CTY, HMCMG_ARVL_DT , WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT ) VALUES ( #esntl_id#, #flight_sn#, #dtrmc_flight#, #dtrmc_start_arprt_code#, #dtrmc_start_cty#, TO_DATE(#dtrmc_start_dt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , #dtrmc_arvl_arprt_code#, #dtrmc_arvl_cty#, TO_DATE(#dtrmc_arvl_dt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , #hmcmg_flight#, #hmcmg_start_arprt_code#, #hmcmg_start_cty#, TO_DATE(#hmcmg_start_dt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , #hmcmg_arvl_arprt_code#, #hmcmg_arvl_cty#, TO_DATE(#hmcmg_arvl_dt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , #esntl_id#, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_FLIGHT SET DTRMC_FLIGHT = #dtrmc_flight#, DTRMC_START_ARPRT_CODE = #dtrmc_start_arprt_code#, DTRMC_START_CTY = #dtrmc_start_cty#, DTRMC_START_DT = TO_DATE(#dtrmc_start_dt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , DTRMC_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE = #dtrmc_arvl_arprt_code#, DTRMC_ARVL_CTY = #dtrmc_arvl_cty#, DTRMC_ARVL_DT = TO_DATE(#dtrmc_arvl_dt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , HMCMG_FLIGHT = #hmcmg_flight#, HMCMG_START_ARPRT_CODE = #hmcmg_start_arprt_code#, HMCMG_START_CTY = #hmcmg_start_cty#, HMCMG_START_DT = TO_DATE(#hmcmg_start_dt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , HMCMG_ARVL_ARPRT_CODE = #hmcmg_arvl_arprt_code#, HMCMG_ARVL_CTY = #hmcmg_arvl_cty#, HMCMG_ARVL_DT = TO_DATE(#hmcmg_arvl_dt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FLIGHT_SN = #flight_sn#
